Additional Scope Comments: Item 011 will be applied to all positions not listed on this NA-1005 as Capstone (Item 010) positions.
Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff of email will be annually.
Legacy Email Scope: Up to approximately 180 days prior to Capstone implementation, disposition for individual legacy emails is carried out according to their subject content, consistent with the approved DeCA retentions.  Legacy emails starting approximately 180 days prior to Capstone implementation will be covered by the Capstone GRS schedule.
URL to Agency Organization Chart: URL not available, please see attached document.

Additional Scope Comments: The agency will use GRS 6.1, item 010 (Capstone), and 011 (non-Capstone) to manage email. All GSA email will be retained based on the disposition stipulated for these two items. GRS 6.1, item 012 will not be used by the agency. This schedule will apply for permanent emails for all of GSA Capstone Officials, regardless of active Record Group affiliation (121, 291, 137, & 352).  All permanent emails using GRS 6.1 will be retained using Record Group 269, Records of General Services Administration regardless of their creator, relation to a particular line of business, or relation to other NARA Groups.
Cutoff Instructions: Cutoff of email will be annual by fiscal year.Cutoff for OIG Capstone officials will occur at the end of the fiscal year (September 30) and transfer to NARA 15 years later.
Transfer Instructions: Transfer when 15 years old.  Transfer for 010 (OIG Capstone officials) will occur 15 years after cutoff.
Legacy Email Scope: General Services Administration will be including legacy email for all items being used, dating back to approximately October 1, 2011.
